commit message: 5.6-rc-1 / 284 version bump
alpha-16 / 285 version bump

Fix :not CSS rule syntax in post detail webview

Unfortunately, the :not selector does not support cascading and it's unsuitable for excluding all tiled-gallery classes. Instead, attach a new class to the gallery elements and use that to uniquely exclude them.
Fixed NewAPI lint error
Improved efficiency by only scanning for images when attachments exist
Improved scanner efficiency

Major rework of PeopleTable

People table has been removed and instead each filter now has it's own table. This change allowed us to simplify a lot of the methods.

Fixes issues from the PeopleTable rework

Also removes isViewer from Person since we don't need to implement that in this PR anymore. Temporarily changes the detail fragment to only work for users.
Unused follower & email follower methods removed from PeopleTable
PeopleTable will only save the correct fields for each table
getPersonFromCursor creates person per table
Removes blogId property from Person
PersonType introduced to Person model
implemented enable/disable SEND option while an operation is in progress
Remove URL fragment when photon-izing an image URL
